definition[0]: to arrange a meeting, event etc
example[0]: I fixed up an interview with him.
example[1]: We’ll have to fix up a time to meet.
definition[1]: to decorate or repair a room or building
example[2]: We fixed up the guest bedroom before he came to stay.
definition[2]: to provide someone with something they want
example[3]: Can you fix me up with a bed for the night?
definition[3]: to find a suitable romantic partner for someone
example[4]: I asked my best friend to fix me up with someone.
